articles.title: TWENTY-FIVE people collapse on the same New York street after a bad reaction to K2
articles.description: At least 25 people were hospitalized in New York City after a possible overdose of synthetic marijuana known as 'K2', believed to be the same location where 33 people overdosed in 2016.
